channel.title: Summoning Commands?

item.title: Summoning Commands?
item.dc:creator: @Demnish Demnish
item.description:
@Demnish wrote:

Hey I need Help Making Summoning Commands That Require A Skill Level To use I use the Source
Project czar Command to make a KDB is

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("a") && playerRights <= 51) { try { int newNPC = 50; if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false); sendMessage("You spawn an KBD"); } else { sendMessage("No such NPC."); }

How Would I Make It Need A Skill To Use that Command? And level?
Also Make it Die In About 3 Minutes After Spawned? And only Can Spawn Up to 2
Summons

Also Would This be Any Use?

[code] }

else if (command.startsWith(“xslime”) && (playerRights >= 2))
{
try{
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1)
{
PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex].npcId = 2316;

PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex].isNpc = true;
PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[otherPIndex].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“Try entering a name you want to transform”); }[/code]

Read full topic
